name: Vanilla Cream Dr. Pepper
description: This really yummy drink tastes like a Dr. Pepper float but with no ice cream added.

name: Sonic Sunrise
description: The Sonic Sunrise is kind of like a Tequila Sunrise without the tequila.

name: Purple Sprite
description: It has the sweet citrus flavor of the soda coupled with all the fruity deliciousness of other the drinks in the equation.
